<section id="versions">
<h5>Versions<a class="headerlink" href="#versions" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h5>
<p>Versions are different versions of the same project documentation.</p>
<p>The versions for a given project can be viewed in a project‚Äôs version page.
For example, here is the <a class="reference external" href="https://readthedocs.org/projects/pip/versions/">Pip project‚Äôs version page</a>.
See <a class="reference internal" href="index.html#document-versions"><span class="doc">Versioned documentation</span></a> for more information.</p>
<section id="versions-listing">
<h6>Versions listing<a class="headerlink" href="#versions-listing" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h6>
<dl class="http get">
<dt class="sig sig-object http" id="get--api-v3-projects-(string-project_slug)-versions-">
<span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">GET</span> </span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/api/v3/projects/</span></span><span class="sig-paren">(</span><em class="property"><span class="pre">string:</span> </em><em class="sig-param"><span class="pre">project_slug</span></em><span class="sig-paren">)</span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/versions/</span></span><a class="headerlink" href="#get--api-v3-projects-(string-project_slug)-versions-" title="Permalink to this definition">ÔÉÅ</a></dt>
<dd><p>Retrieve a list of all versions for a project.</p>
<p><strong>Example request</strong>:</p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" class="closeable" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-6-QmFzaA==" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-6-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tab" tabindex="0">Bash</button><button aria-controls="panel-6-UHl0aG9u" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-6-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tab" tabindex="-1">Python</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-6-QmFzaA==" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-6-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-bash notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span>$<span class="w"> </span>curl<span class="w"> </span>-H<span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Authorization: Token &lt;token&gt;&quot;</span><span class="w"> </span>https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/versions/
</pre></div>
</div>
</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-6-UHl0aG9u" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-6-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-python notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>
<span class="n">URL</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/versions/&#39;</span>
<span class="n">TOKEN</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;&lt;token&gt;&#39;</span>
<span class="n">HEADERS</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">&#39;Authorization&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="sa">f</span><span class="s1">&#39;token </span><span class="si">{</span><span class="n">TOKEN</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">URL</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">HEADERS</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">json</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div></div>
<p><strong>Example response</strong>:</p>
<div class="highlight-json notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;count&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">25</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;next&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/pip/versions/?limit=10&amp;offset=10&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;previous&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;results&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">&quot;VERSION&quot;</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Query Parameters<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>active</strong> (<em>boolean</em>) ‚Äì return only active versions</p></li>
<li><p><strong>built</strong> (<em>boolean</em>) ‚Äì return only built versions</p></li>
<li><p><strong>privacy_level</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì return versions with specific privacy level (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">public</span></code> or <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">private</span></code>)</p></li>
<li><p><strong>slug</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì return versions with matching slug</p></li>
<li><p><strong>type</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì return versions with specific type (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">branch</span></code> or <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">tag</span></code>)</p></li>
<li><p><strong>verbose_name</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì return versions with matching version name</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</dd></dl>

</section>
<section id="version-detail">
<h6>Version detail<a class="headerlink" href="#version-detail" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h6>
<dl class="http get">
<dt class="sig sig-object http" id="get--api-v3-projects-(string-project_slug)-versions-(string-version_slug)-">
<span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">GET</span> </span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/api/v3/projects/</span></span><span class="sig-paren">(</span><em class="property"><span class="pre">string:</span> </em><em class="sig-param"><span class="pre">project_slug</span></em><span class="sig-paren">)</span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/versions/</span></span><span class="sig-paren">(</span><em class="property"><span class="pre">string:</span> </em><em class="sig-param"><span class="pre">version_slug</span></em><span class="sig-paren">)</span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/</span></span><a class="headerlink" href="#get--api-v3-projects-(string-project_slug)-versions-(string-version_slug)-" title="Permalink to this definition">ÔÉÅ</a></dt>
<dd><p>Retrieve details of a single version.</p>
<p><strong>Example request</strong>:</p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" class="closeable" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-7-QmFzaA==" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-7-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tab" tabindex="0">Bash</button><button aria-controls="panel-7-UHl0aG9u" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-7-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tab" tabindex="-1">Python</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-7-QmFzaA==" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-7-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-bash notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span>$<span class="w"> </span>curl<span class="w"> </span>-H<span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Authorization: Token &lt;token&gt;&quot;</span><span class="w"> </span>https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/versions/stable/
</pre></div>
</div>
</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-7-UHl0aG9u" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-7-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-python notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>
<span class="n">URL</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/versions/stable/&#39;</span>
<span class="n">TOKEN</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;&lt;token&gt;&#39;</span>
<span class="n">HEADERS</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">&#39;Authorization&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="sa">f</span><span class="s1">&#39;token </span><span class="si">{</span><span class="n">TOKEN</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">URL</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">HEADERS</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">json</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div></div>
<p><strong>Example response</strong>:</p>
<div class="highlight-json notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;id&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">71652437</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;slug&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;stable&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;verbose_name&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;stable&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;identifier&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;3a6b3995c141c0888af6591a59240ba5db7d9914&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;ref&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;19.0.2&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;built&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;active&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;hidden&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;type&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;tag&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;last_build&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;{BUILD}&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;privacy_level&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;public&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;downloads&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="nt">&quot;pdf&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://pip.readthedocs.io/_/downloads/pdf/pip/stable/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="nt">&quot;htmlzip&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://pip.readthedocs.io/_/downloads/htmlzip/pip/stable/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="nt">&quot;epub&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://pip.readthedocs.io/_/downloads/epub/pip/stable/&quot;</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;urls&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="nt">&quot;dashboard&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;edit&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://readthedocs.org/dashboard/pip/version/stable/edit/&quot;</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="nt">&quot;documentation&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="nt">&quot;vcs&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://github.com/pypa/pip/tree/19.0.2&quot;</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;_links&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="nt">&quot;_self&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/pip/versions/stable/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="nt">&quot;builds&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/pip/versions/stable/builds/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="nt">&quot;project&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/pip/&quot;</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Response JSON Object<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>ref</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì the version slug where the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">stable</span></code> version points to.
<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">null</span></code> when it‚Äôs not the stable version.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>built</strong> (<em>boolean</em>) ‚Äì the version has at least one successful build.</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
<dt class="field-even">Query Parameters<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-even"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>expand</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì allows to add/expand some extra fields in the response.
Allowed values are <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">last_build</span></code> and <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">last_build.config</span></code>.
Multiple fields can be passed separated by commas.</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</dd></dl>

</section>
<section id="version-update">
<h6>Version update<a class="headerlink" href="#version-update" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h6>
<dl class="http patch">
<dt class="sig sig-object http" id="patch--api-v3-projects-(string-project_slug)-versions-(string-version_slug)-">
<span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">PATCH</span> </span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/api/v3/projects/</span></span><span class="sig-paren">(</span><em class="property"><span class="pre">string:</span> </em><em class="sig-param"><span class="pre">project_slug</span></em><span class="sig-paren">)</span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/versions/</span></span><span class="sig-paren">(</span><em class="property"><span class="pre">string:</span> </em><em class="sig-param"><span class="pre">version_slug</span></em><span class="sig-paren">)</span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/</span></span><a class="headerlink" href="#patch--api-v3-projects-(string-project_slug)-versions-(string-version_slug)-" title="Permalink to this definition">ÔÉÅ</a></dt>
<dd><p>Update a version.</p>
<p>When a version is deactivated, its documentation is removed,
and when it‚Äôs activated, a new build is triggered.</p>
<p>Updates to a version also invalidates its CDN cache.</p>
<p><strong>Example request</strong>:</p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" class="closeable" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-8-QmFzaA==" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-8-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tab" tabindex="0">Bash</button><button aria-controls="panel-8-UHl0aG9u" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-8-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tab" tabindex="-1">Python</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-8-QmFzaA==" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-8-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-bash notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span>$<span class="w"> </span>curl<span class="w"> </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="w">  </span>-X<span class="w"> </span>PATCH<span class="w"> </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="w">  </span>-H<span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Authorization: Token &lt;token&gt;&quot;</span><span class="w"> </span>https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/versions/0.23/<span class="w"> </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="w">  </span>-H<span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Content-Type: application/json&quot;</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="w">  </span>-d<span class="w"> </span>@body.json
</pre></div>
</div>
</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-8-UHl0aG9u" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-8-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-python notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">json</span>
<span class="n">URL</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/versions/0.23/&#39;</span>
<span class="n">TOKEN</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;&lt;token&gt;&#39;</span>
<span class="n">HEADERS</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">&#39;Authorization&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="sa">f</span><span class="s1">&#39;token </span><span class="si">{</span><span class="n">TOKEN</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">json</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">load</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;body.json&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;rb&#39;</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">patch</span><span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="n">URL</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="n">json</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">HEADERS</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">json</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div></div>
<p>The content of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">body.json</span></code> is like,</p>
<div class="highlight-json notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;active&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;hidden&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;privacy_level&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;public&quot;</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Status Codes<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><span><a class="reference external" href="https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec10.html#sec10.2.5">204 No Content</a></span> ‚Äì Updated successfully</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
<div class="admonition note">
<p class="admonition-title">Note</p>
<p>Privacy levels are only available in <a class="reference internal" href="index.html#document-commercial/index"><span class="doc">Read the Docs for Business</span></a>.</p>
</div>
</dd></dl>

</section>

<section id="builds">
<h5>Builds<a class="headerlink" href="#builds" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h5>
<p>Builds are created by Read the Docs whenever a <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">Project</span></code> has its documentation built.
Frequently this happens automatically via a web hook but can be triggered manually.</p>
<p>Builds can be viewed in the build page for a project.
For example, here is <a class="reference external" href="https://readthedocs.org/projects/pip/builds/">Pip‚Äôs build page</a>.
See <a class="reference internal" href="index.html#document-builds"><span class="doc">Build process overview</span></a> for more information.</p>
<section id="build-details">
<h6>Build details<a class="headerlink" href="#build-details" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h6>
<dl class="http get">
<dt class="sig sig-object http" id="get--api-v3-projects-(str-project_slug)-builds-(int-build_id)-">
<span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">GET</span> </span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/api/v3/projects/</span></span><span class="sig-paren">(</span><em class="property"><span class="pre">str:</span> </em><em class="sig-param"><span class="pre">project_slug</span></em><span class="sig-paren">)</span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/builds/</span></span><span class="sig-paren">(</span><em class="property"><span class="pre">int:</span> </em><em class="sig-param"><span class="pre">build_id</span></em><span class="sig-paren">)</span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/</span></span><a class="headerlink" href="#get--api-v3-projects-(str-project_slug)-builds-(int-build_id)-" title="Permalink to this definition">ÔÉÅ</a></dt>
<dd><p>Retrieve details of a single build for a project.</p>
<p><strong>Example request</strong>:</p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" class="closeable" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-9-QmFzaA==" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-9-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tab" tabindex="0">Bash</button><button aria-controls="panel-9-UHl0aG9u" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-9-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tab" tabindex="-1">Python</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-9-QmFzaA==" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-9-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-bash notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span>$<span class="w"> </span>curl<span class="w"> </span>-H<span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Authorization: Token &lt;token&gt;&quot;</span><span class="w"> </span>https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/builds/8592686/?expand<span class="o">=</span>config
</pre></div>
</div>
</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-9-UHl0aG9u" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-9-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-python notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>
<span class="n">URL</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/builds/8592686/?expand=config&#39;</span>
<span class="n">TOKEN</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;&lt;token&gt;&#39;</span>
<span class="n">HEADERS</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">&#39;Authorization&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="sa">f</span><span class="s1">&#39;token </span><span class="si">{</span><span class="n">TOKEN</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">URL</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">HEADERS</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">json</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div></div>
<p><strong>Example response</strong>:</p>
<div class="highlight-json notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>

<span class="w">            </span><span class="p">],</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;use_system_site_packages&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">false</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="nt">&quot;conda&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span>

<span class="w">        </span><span class="nt">&quot;sphinx&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;builder&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;sphinx_htmldir&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;configuration&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;.../stable/docs/html/conf.py&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;fail_on_warning&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">false</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="nt">&quot;mkdocs&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;configuration&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;fail_on_warning&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">false</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="nt">&quot;submodules&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;include&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;all&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;exclude&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[],</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;recursive&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;_links&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="nt">&quot;_self&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/pip/builds/8592686/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="nt">&quot;project&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/pip/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="nt">&quot;version&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/pip/versions/latest/&quot;</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Response JSON Object<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>created</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The ISO-8601 datetime when the build was created.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>finished</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The ISO-8601 datetime when the build has finished.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>duration</strong> (<em>integer</em>) ‚Äì The length of the build in seconds.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>state</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The state of the build (one of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">triggered</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">building</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">installing</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">cloning</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">finished</span></code> or <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">cancelled</span></code>)</p></li>
<li><p><strong>error</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì An error message if the build was unsuccessful</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
<dt class="field-even">Query Parameters<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-even"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>expand</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì allows to add/expand some extra fields in the response.
Allowed value is <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">config</span></code>.</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</dd></dl>

</section>
<section id="builds-listing">
<h6>Builds listing<a class="headerlink" href="#builds-listing" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h6>
<dl class="http get">
<dt class="sig sig-object http" id="get--api-v3-projects-(str-project_slug)-builds-">

<p><strong>Example request</strong>:</p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" class="closeable" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-10-QmFzaA==" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-10-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tab" tabindex="0">Bash</button><button aria-controls="panel-10-UHl0aG9u" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-10-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tab" tabindex="-1">Python</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-10-QmFzaA==" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-10-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-bash notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span>$<span class="w"> </span>curl<span class="w"> </span>-H<span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Authorization: Token &lt;token&gt;&quot;</span><span class="w"> </span>https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/builds/
</pre></div>
</div>
</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-10-UHl0aG9u" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-10-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-python notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>
<span class="n">URL</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/builds/&#39;</span>
<span class="n">TOKEN</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;&lt;token&gt;&#39;</span>
<span class="n">HEADERS</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">&#39;Authorization&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="sa">f</span><span class="s1">&#39;token </span><span class="si">{</span><span class="n">TOKEN</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">URL</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">HEADERS</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">json</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div></div>
<p><strong>Example response</strong>:</p>
<div class="highlight-json notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;count&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">15</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;next&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/pip/builds?limit=10&amp;offset=10&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;previous&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;results&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">&quot;BUILD&quot;</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Query Parameters<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>commit</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì commit hash to filter the builds returned by commit</p></li>
<li><p><strong>running</strong> (<em>boolean</em>) ‚Äì filter the builds that are currently building/running</p></li>

</dl>

<section id="subprojects">
<h5>Subprojects<a class="headerlink" href="#subprojects" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h5>
<p>Projects can be configured in a nested manner,
by configuring a project as a subproject of another project.
This allows for documentation projects to share a search index and a namespace or custom domain,
but still be maintained independently.
See <a class="reference internal" href="index.html#document-subprojects"><span class="doc">Subprojects: host multiple projects on a single domain</span></a> for more information.</p>

</div>
</dd></dl>

<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" class="closeable" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-13-QmFzaA==" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-13-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tab" tabindex="0">Bash</button><button aria-controls="panel-13-UHl0aG9u" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-13-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tab" tabindex="-1">Python</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-13-QmFzaA==" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-13-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-bash notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span>$<span class="w"> </span>curl<span class="w"> </span>-H<span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Authorization: Token &lt;token&gt;&quot;</span><span class="w"> </span>https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/subprojects/
</pre></div>
</div>
</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-13-UHl0aG9u" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-13-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-python notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>
<span class="n">URL</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/subprojects/&#39;</span>
<span class="n">TOKEN</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;&lt;token&gt;&#39;</span>
<span class="n">HEADERS</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">&#39;Authorization&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="sa">f</span><span class="s1">&#39;token </span><span class="si">{</span><span class="n">TOKEN</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="p">}</span>

<p><strong>Example response</strong>:</p>
<div class="highlight-json notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;count&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">25</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;next&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/pip/subprojects/?limit=10&amp;offset=10&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;previous&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;results&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">&quot;SUBPROJECT RELATIONSHIP&quot;</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</dd></dl>

</section>
<section id="subproject-create">
<h6>Subproject create<a class="headerlink" href="#subproject-create" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h6>
<dl class="http post">
<dt class="sig sig-object http" id="post--api-v3-projects-(str-project_slug)-subprojects-">
<span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">POST</span> </span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/api/v3/projects/</span></span><span class="sig-paren">(</span><em class="property"><span class="pre">str:</span> </em><em class="sig-param"><span class="pre">project_slug</span></em><span class="sig-paren">)</span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/subprojects/</span></span><a class="headerlink" href="#post--api-v3-projects-(str-project_slug)-subprojects-" title="Permalink to this definition">ÔÉÅ</a></dt>
<dd><p>Create a subproject relationship between two projects.</p>
<p><strong>Example request</strong>:</p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" class="closeable" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-14-QmFzaA==" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-14-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tab" tabindex="0">Bash</button><button aria-controls="panel-14-UHl0aG9u" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-14-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tab" tabindex="-1">Python</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-14-QmFzaA==" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-14-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-bash notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span>$<span class="w"> </span>curl<span class="w"> </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="w">  </span>-X<span class="w"> </span>POST<span class="w"> </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="w">  </span>-H<span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Authorization: Token &lt;token&gt;&quot;</span><span class="w"> </span>https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/subprojects/<span class="w"> </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="w">  </span>-H<span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Content-Type: application/json&quot;</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="w">  </span>-d<span class="w"> </span>@body.json
</pre></div>
</div>
</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-14-UHl0aG9u" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-14-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-python notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">json</span>
<span class="n">URL</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/subprojects/&#39;</span>
<span class="n">TOKEN</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;&lt;token&gt;&#39;</span>
<span class="n">HEADERS</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">&#39;Authorization&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="sa">f</span><span class="s1">&#39;token </span><span class="si">{</span><span class="n">TOKEN</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">json</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">load</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;body.json&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;rb&#39;</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">post</span><span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="n">URL</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="n">json</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">HEADERS</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">json</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div></div>
<p>The content of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">body.json</span></code> is like,</p>
<div class="highlight-json notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;child&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;subproject-child-slug&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;alias&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;subproject-alias&quot;</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<div class="admonition note">
<p class="admonition-title">Note</p>
<p><code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">child</span></code> must be a project that you have access to.
Or if you are using <a class="reference internal" href="index.html#document-commercial/index"><span class="doc">About Read the Docs for Business</span></a>,
additionally the project must be under the same organization as the parent project.</p>
</div>
<p><strong>Example response</strong>:</p>
<p><a class="reference external" href="#subproject-details">See Subproject details</a></p>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Response JSON Object<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>child</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì slug of the child project in the relationship.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>alias</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì optional slug alias to be used in the URL (e.g <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">/projects/&lt;alias&gt;/en/latest/</span></code>).
If not provided, child project‚Äôs slug is used as alias.</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
<dt class="field-even">Status Codes<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-even"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><span><a class="reference external" href="https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec10.html#sec10.2.2">201 Created</a></span> ‚Äì Subproject created successfully</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</dd></dl>

</section>
<section id="subproject-delete">

<dd><p>Delete a subproject relationship.</p>
<p><strong>Example request</strong>:</p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" class="closeable" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-15-QmFzaA==" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-15-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tab" tabindex="0">Bash</button><button aria-controls="panel-15-UHl0aG9u" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-15-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tab" tabindex="-1">Python</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-15-QmFzaA==" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-15-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-bash notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span>$<span class="w"> </span>curl<span class="w"> </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="w">  </span>-X<span class="w"> </span>DELETE<span class="w"> </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="w">  </span>-H<span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Authorization: Token &lt;token&gt;&quot;</span><span class="w"> </span>https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/subprojects/subproject-alias/
</pre></div>
</div>
</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-15-UHl0aG9u" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-15-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-python notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>
<span class="n">URL</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/subprojects/subproject-alias/&#39;</span>
<span class="n">TOKEN</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;&lt;token&gt;&#39;</span>
<span class="n">HEADERS</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">&#39;Authorization&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="sa">f</span><span class="s1">&#39;token </span><span class="si">{</span><span class="n">TOKEN</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">delete</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">URL</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">HEADERS</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">json</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div></div>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Status Codes<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><span><a class="reference external" href="https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec10.html#sec10.2.5">204 No Content</a></span> ‚Äì Subproject deleted successfully</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</dd></dl>

<section id="translations">

<p>Translations are the same version of a Project in a different language.

<span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">GET</span> </span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/api/v3/projects/</span></span><span class="sig-paren">(</span><em class="property"><span class="pre">str:</span> </em><em class="sig-param"><span class="pre">project_slug</span></em><span class="sig-paren">)</span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/translations/</span></span><a class="headerlink" href="#get--api-v3-projects-(str-project_slug)-translations-" title="Permalink to this definition">ÔÉÅ</a></dt>
<dd><p>Retrieve a list of all translations for a project.</p>
<p><strong>Example request</strong>:</p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" class="closeable" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-16-QmFzaA==" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-16-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tab" tabindex="0">Bash</button><button aria-controls="panel-16-UHl0aG9u" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-16-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tab" tabindex="-1">Python</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-16-QmFzaA==" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-16-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-bash notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span>$<span class="w"> </span>curl<span class="w"> </span>-H<span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Authorization: Token &lt;token&gt;&quot;</span><span class="w"> </span>https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/translations/
</pre></div>
</div>
</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-16-UHl0aG9u" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-16-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-python notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>
<span class="n">URL</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/translations/&#39;</span>

<span class="n">HEADERS</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">&#39;Authorization&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="sa">f</span><span class="s1">&#39;token </span><span class="si">{</span><span class="n">TOKEN</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">URL</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">HEADERS</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">json</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div></div>

<span class="w">        </span><span class="nt">&quot;language&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;code&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;en&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>

<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">},</span>

<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;versions&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/pip/versions/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;builds&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/pip/builds/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;subprojects&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/pip/subprojects/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;superproject&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/pip/superproject/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;redirects&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/pip/redirects/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;translations&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/pip/translations/&quot;</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="p">}]</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>The <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">results</span></code> in response is an array of project data,
which is same as <a class="reference internal" href="#get--api-v3-projects-(string-project_slug)-" title="GET /api/v3/projects/(string:project_slug)/"><code class="xref http http-get docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">GET</span> <span class="pre">/api/v3/projects/(string:project_slug)/</span></code></a>.</p>
</dd></dl>

<section id="redirects">
<h5>Redirects<a class="headerlink" href="#redirects" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h5>
<p>Redirects allow the author to redirect an old URL of the documentation to a new one.
This is useful when pages are moved around in the structure of the documentation set.
See <a class="reference internal" href="index.html#document-user-defined-redirects"><span class="doc">Custom and built-in redirects on Read the Docs</span></a> for more information.</p>
<section id="redirect-details">
<h6>Redirect details<a class="headerlink" href="#redirect-details" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h6>

<dd><p>Retrieve details of a single redirect for a project.</p>
<p><strong>Example request</strong></p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" class="closeable" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-17-QmFzaA==" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-17-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tab" tabindex="0">Bash</button><button aria-controls="panel-17-UHl0aG9u" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-17-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tab" tabindex="-1">Python</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-17-QmFzaA==" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-17-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-bash notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span>$<span class="w"> </span>curl<span class="w"> </span>-H<span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Authorization: Token &lt;token&gt;&quot;</span><span class="w"> </span>https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/redirects/1/
</pre></div>
</div>
</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-17-UHl0aG9u" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-17-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-python notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>
<span class="n">URL</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/redirects/1/&#39;</span>
<span class="n">TOKEN</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;&lt;token&gt;&#39;</span>
<span class="n">HEADERS</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">&#39;Authorization&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="sa">f</span><span class="s1">&#39;token </span><span class="si">{</span><span class="n">TOKEN</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">URL</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">HEADERS</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">json</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div></div>
<p><strong>Example response</strong></p>
<div class="highlight-json notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;pk&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;created&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;2019-04-29T10:00:00Z&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;modified&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;2019-04-29T12:00:00Z&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;project&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;pip&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;from_url&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/docs/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;to_url&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/documentation/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;type&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;page&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;_links&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="nt">&quot;_self&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/pip/redirects/1/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="nt">&quot;project&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/pip/&quot;</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</dd></dl>

<dl class="http get">

<span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">GET</span> </span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/api/v3/projects/</span></span><span class="sig-paren">(</span><em class="property"><span class="pre">str:</span> </em><em class="sig-param"><span class="pre">project_slug</span></em><span class="sig-paren">)</span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/redirects/</span></span><a class="headerlink" href="#get--api-v3-projects-(str-project_slug)-redirects-" title="Permalink to this definition">ÔÉÅ</a></dt>

</pre></div>
</div>
</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-18-UHl0aG9u" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-18-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-python notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>
<span class="n">URL</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/redirects/&#39;</span>
<span class="n">TOKEN</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;&lt;token&gt;&#39;</span>
<span class="n">HEADERS</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">&#39;Authorization&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="sa">f</span><span class="s1">&#39;token </span><span class="si">{</span><span class="n">TOKEN</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">URL</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">HEADERS</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">json</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div></div>
<p><strong>Example response</strong></p>
<div class="highlight-json notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;count&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">25</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;next&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/pip/redirects/?limit=10&amp;offset=10&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;previous&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;results&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">&quot;REDIRECT&quot;</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</dd></dl>

</section>
<section id="redirect-create">
<h6>Redirect create<a class="headerlink" href="#redirect-create" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h6>
<dl class="http post">
<dt class="sig sig-object http" id="post--api-v3-projects-(str-project_slug)-redirects-">
<span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">POST</span> </span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/api/v3/projects/</span></span><span class="sig-paren">(</span><em class="property"><span class="pre">str:</span> </em><em class="sig-param"><span class="pre">project_slug</span></em><span class="sig-paren">)</span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/redirects/</span></span><a class="headerlink" href="#post--api-v3-projects-(str-project_slug)-redirects-" title="Permalink to this definition">ÔÉÅ</a></dt>
<dd><p>Create a redirect for this project.</p>
<p><strong>Example request</strong>:</p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" class="closeable" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-19-QmFzaA==" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-19-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tab" tabindex="0">Bash</button><button aria-controls="panel-19-UHl0aG9u" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-19-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tab" tabindex="-1">Python</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-19-QmFzaA==" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-19-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-bash notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span>$<span class="w"> </span>curl<span class="w"> </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="w">  </span>-X<span class="w"> </span>POST<span class="w"> </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="w">  </span>-H<span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Authorization: Token &lt;token&gt;&quot;</span><span class="w"> </span>https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/redirects/<span class="w"> </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="w">  </span>-H<span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Content-Type: application/json&quot;</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="w">  </span>-d<span class="w"> </span>@body.json
</pre></div>
</div>
</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-19-UHl0aG9u" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-19-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-python notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">json</span>
<span class="n">URL</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/redirects/&#39;</span>
<span class="n">TOKEN</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;&lt;token&gt;&#39;</span>
<span class="n">HEADERS</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">&#39;Authorization&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="sa">f</span><span class="s1">&#39;token </span><span class="si">{</span><span class="n">TOKEN</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">json</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">load</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;body.json&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;rb&#39;</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">post</span><span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="n">URL</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="n">json</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">HEADERS</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">json</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div></div>
<p>The content of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">body.json</span></code> is like,</p>
<div class="highlight-json notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;from_url&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/docs/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;to_url&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/documentation/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;type&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;page&quot;</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<div class="admonition note">
<p class="admonition-title">Note</p>
<p><code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">type</span></code> can be one of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">prefix</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">page</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">exact</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">sphinx_html</span></code> and <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">sphinx_htmldir</span></code>.</p>
<p>Depending on the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">type</span></code> of the redirect, some fields may not be needed:</p>
<ul class="simple">
<li><p><code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">prefix</span></code> type does not require <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">to_url</span></code>.</p></li>
<li><p><code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">page</span></code> and <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">exact</span></code> types require <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">from_url</span></code> and <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">to_url</span></code>.</p></li>
<li><p><code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">sphinx_html</span></code> and <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">sphinx_htmldir</span></code> types do not require <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">from_url</span></code> and <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">to_url</span></code>.</p></li>
</ul>
</div>
<p><strong>Example response</strong>:</p>
<p><a class="reference external" href="#redirect-details">See Redirect details</a></p>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Status Codes<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><span><a class="reference external" href="https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec10.html#sec10.2.2">201 Created</a></span> ‚Äì redirect created successfully</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</dd></dl>

</section>
<section id="redirect-update">

<dd><p>Update a redirect for this project.</p>

<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" class="closeable" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-20-QmFzaA==" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-20-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tab" tabindex="0">Bash</button><button aria-controls="panel-20-UHl0aG9u" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-20-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tab" tabindex="-1">Python</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-20-QmFzaA==" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-20-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-bash notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span>$<span class="w"> </span>curl<span class="w"> </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="w">  </span>-X<span class="w"> </span>PUT<span class="w"> </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="w">  </span>-H<span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Authorization: Token &lt;token&gt;&quot;</span><span class="w"> </span>https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/redirects/1/<span class="w"> </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="w">  </span>-H<span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Content-Type: application/json&quot;</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="w">  </span>-d<span class="w"> </span>@body.json
</pre></div>
</div>
</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-20-UHl0aG9u" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-20-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-python notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">json</span>
<span class="n">URL</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/redirects/1/&#39;</span>
<span class="n">TOKEN</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;&lt;token&gt;&#39;</span>
<span class="n">HEADERS</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">&#39;Authorization&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="sa">f</span><span class="s1">&#39;token </span><span class="si">{</span><span class="n">TOKEN</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">json</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">load</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;body.json&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;rb&#39;</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">put</span><span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="n">URL</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="n">json</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">HEADERS</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">json</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div></div>
<p>The content of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">body.json</span></code> is like,</p>
<div class="highlight-json notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;from_url&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/docs/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;to_url&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/documentation.html&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;type&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;page&quot;</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p><strong>Example response</strong>:</p>

</dd></dl>

<section id="environment-variables">
<h5>Environment variables<a class="headerlink" href="#environment-variables" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h5>
<p>Environment variables are variables that you can define for your project.
These variables are used in the build process when building your documentation.
They are for example useful to define secrets in a safe way that can be used by your documentation to build properly.
Environment variables can also be made public, allowing for them to be used in PR builds.
See <a class="reference internal" href="index.html#document-environment-variables"><span class="doc">Understanding environment variables</span></a>.</p>
<section id="environment-variable-details">
<h6>Environment variable details<a class="headerlink" href="#environment-variable-details" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h6>

</pre></div>
</div>
</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-22-UHl0aG9u" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-22-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-python notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>

<span class="n">HEADERS</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">&#39;Authorization&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="sa">f</span><span class="s1">&#39;token </span><span class="si">{</span><span class="n">TOKEN</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">URL</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">HEADERS</span><span class="p">)</span>

</div></div>

<span class="w">        </span><span class="nt">&quot;_self&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/project/environmentvariables/1/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="nt">&quot;project&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/project/&quot;</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="nt">&quot;created&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;2019-04-29T10:00:00Z&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="nt">&quot;modified&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;2019-04-29T12:00:00Z&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="nt">&quot;pk&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="nt">&quot;project&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;project&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="nt">&quot;public&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="nt">&quot;name&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;ENVVAR&quot;</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

</div>

</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-23-UHl0aG9u" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-23-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-python notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>

<span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">URL</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">HEADERS</span><span class="p">)</span>

<section id="environment-variable-create">

<dl class="http post">
