<span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">POST</span> </span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/api/v3/projects/</span></span><span class="sig-paren">(</span><em class="property"><span class="pre">str:</span> </em><em class="sig-param"><span class="pre">project_slug</span></em><span class="sig-paren">)</span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/environmentvariables/</span></span><a class="headerlink" href="#post--api-v3-projects-(str-project_slug)-environmentvariables-" title="Permalink to this definition">ÔÉÅ</a></dt>
<dd><p>Create an environment variable for this project.</p>
<p><strong>Example request</strong>:</p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" class="closeable" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-24-QmFzaA==" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-24-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tab" tabindex="0">Bash</button><button aria-controls="panel-24-UHl0aG9u" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-24-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tab" tabindex="-1">Python</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-24-QmFzaA==" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-24-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-bash notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span>$<span class="w"> </span>curl<span class="w"> </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="w">  </span>-X<span class="w"> </span>POST<span class="w"> </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="w">  </span>-H<span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Authorization: Token &lt;token&gt;&quot;</span><span class="w"> </span>https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/environmentvariables/<span class="w"> </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="w">  </span>-H<span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Content-Type: application/json&quot;</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="w">  </span>-d<span class="w"> </span>@body.json
</pre></div>
</div>
</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-24-UHl0aG9u" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-24-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-python notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">json</span>
<span class="n">URL</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/projects/pip/environmentvariables/&#39;</span>
<span class="n">TOKEN</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;&lt;token&gt;&#39;</span>
<span class="n">HEADERS</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">&#39;Authorization&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="sa">f</span><span class="s1">&#39;token </span><span class="si">{</span><span class="n">TOKEN</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">json</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">load</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;body.json&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;rb&#39;</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">post</span><span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="n">URL</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="n">json</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">HEADERS</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">json</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div></div>
<p>The content of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">body.json</span></code> is like,</p>
<div class="highlight-json notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;name&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;MYVAR&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;value&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;My secret value&quot;</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p><strong>Example response</strong>:</p>

<section id="remote-organizations">
<h5>Remote organizations<a class="headerlink" href="#remote-organizations" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h5>
<p>Remote organizations are the VCS organizations connected via
<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">GitHub</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">GitLab</span></code> and <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">Bitbucket</span></code>.</p>
<section id="remote-organization-listing">
<h6>Remote organization listing<a class="headerlink" href="#remote-organization-listing" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h6>
<dl class="http get">
<dt class="sig sig-object http" id="get--api-v3-remote-organizations-">
<span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">GET</span> </span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/api/v3/remote/organizations/</span></span><a class="headerlink" href="#get--api-v3-remote-organizations-" title="Permalink to this definition">ÔÉÅ</a></dt>
<dd><p>Retrieve a list of all Remote Organizations for the authenticated user.</p>
<p><strong>Example request</strong>:</p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" class="closeable" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-29-QmFzaA==" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-29-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tab" tabindex="0">Bash</button><button aria-controls="panel-29-UHl0aG9u" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-29-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tab" tabindex="-1">Python</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-29-QmFzaA==" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-29-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-bash notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span>$<span class="w"> </span>curl<span class="w"> </span>-H<span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Authorization: Token &lt;token&gt;&quot;</span><span class="w"> </span>https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/remote/organizations/
</pre></div>
</div>
</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-29-UHl0aG9u" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-29-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-python notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>
<span class="n">URL</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/remote/organizations/&#39;</span>
<span class="n">TOKEN</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;&lt;token&gt;&#39;</span>
<span class="n">HEADERS</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">&#39;Authorization&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="sa">f</span><span class="s1">&#39;token </span><span class="si">{</span><span class="n">TOKEN</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">URL</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">HEADERS</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">json</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div></div>
<p><strong>Example response</strong>:</p>
<div class="highlight-json notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;count&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;next&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;api/v3/remote/organizations/?limit=10&amp;offset=10&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;previous&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;results&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;avatar_url&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/12345?v=4&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;created&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;2019-04-29T10:00:00Z&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;modified&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;2019-04-29T12:00:00Z&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;name&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Organization Name&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;pk&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;slug&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;organization&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;url&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://github.com/organization&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;vcs_provider&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;github&quot;</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>The <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">results</span></code> in response is an array of remote organizations data.</p>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Query Parameters<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>name</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì return remote organizations with containing the name</p></li>
<li><p><strong>vcs_provider</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì return remote organizations for specific vcs provider (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">github</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">gitlab</span></code> or <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">bitbucket</span></code>)</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
<dt class="field-even">Request Headers<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-even"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><span><a class="reference external" href="https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc7235#section-4.2">Authorization</a></span> ‚Äì token to authenticate.</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</dd></dl>

</section>
</section>
<section id="remote-repositories">
<h5>Remote repositories<a class="headerlink" href="#remote-repositories" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h5>

<p><strong>Example request</strong>:</p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" class="closeable" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-30-QmFzaA==" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-30-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tab" tabindex="0">Bash</button><button aria-controls="panel-30-UHl0aG9u" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-30-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tab" tabindex="-1">Python</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-30-QmFzaA==" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-30-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-bash notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span>$<span class="w"> </span>curl<span class="w"> </span>-H<span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Authorization: Token &lt;token&gt;&quot;</span><span class="w"> </span>https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/remote/repositories/?expand<span class="o">=</span>projects,remote_organization

<span class="w">                </span><span class="p">},</span>

<span class="w">                    </span><span class="nt">&quot;url&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://github.com/organization/project&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">                    </span><span class="nt">&quot;type&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;git&quot;</span>
<span class="w">                </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="w">                </span><span class="nt">&quot;default_version&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;stable&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">                </span><span class="nt">&quot;default_branch&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;master&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">                </span><span class="nt">&quot;subproject_of&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">                </span><span class="nt">&quot;translation_of&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">                </span><span class="nt">&quot;urls&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">                    </span><span class="nt">&quot;documentation&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;http://project.readthedocs.io/en/stable/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">                    </span><span class="nt">&quot;home&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://readthedocs.org/projects/project/&quot;</span>
<span class="w">                </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="w">                </span><span class="nt">&quot;tags&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span>
<span class="w">                    </span><span class="s2">&quot;test&quot;</span>
<span class="w">                </span><span class="p">],</span>
<span class="w">                </span><span class="nt">&quot;users&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span>
<span class="w">                    </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">                        </span><span class="nt">&quot;username&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;dstufft&quot;</span>
<span class="w">                    </span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="w">                </span><span class="p">],</span>
<span class="w">                </span><span class="nt">&quot;_links&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">                    </span><span class="nt">&quot;_self&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/project/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">                    </span><span class="nt">&quot;versions&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/project/versions/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">                    </span><span class="nt">&quot;builds&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/project/builds/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">                    </span><span class="nt">&quot;subprojects&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/project/subprojects/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">                    </span><span class="nt">&quot;superproject&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/project/superproject/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">                    </span><span class="nt">&quot;redirects&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/project/redirects/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">                    </span><span class="nt">&quot;translations&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/api/v3/projects/project/translations/&quot;</span>
<span class="w">                </span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="p">}],</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;avatar_url&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://avatars3.githubusercontent.com/u/test-organization?v=4&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;clone_url&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://github.com/organization/project.git&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;created&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;2019-04-29T10:00:00Z&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;description&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;This is a test project.&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;full_name&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;organization/project&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;html_url&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://github.com/organization/project&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;modified&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;2019-04-29T12:00:00Z&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;name&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;project&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;pk&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;ssh_url&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;git@github.com:organization/project.git&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;vcs&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;git&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;vcs_provider&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;github&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;default_branch&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;master&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;private&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;admin&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>The <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">results</span></code> in response is an array of remote repositories data.</p>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Query Parameters<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>name</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì return remote repositories containing the name</p></li>
<li><p><strong>vcs_provider</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì return remote repositories for specific vcs provider (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">github</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">gitlab</span></code> or <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">bitbucket</span></code>)</p></li>
<li><p><strong>organization</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì return remote repositories for specific remote organization (using remote organization <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">slug</span></code>)</p></li>
<li><p><strong>expand</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì allows to add/expand some extra fields in the response.
Allowed values are <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">projects</span></code> and <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">remote_organization</span></code>.
Multiple fields can be passed separated by commas.</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
<dt class="field-even">Request Headers<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-even"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><span><a class="reference external" href="https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc7235#section-4.2">Authorization</a></span> ‚Äì token to authenticate.</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</dd></dl>

</section>
</section>
</section>
<section id="embed">
<h4>Embed<a class="headerlink" href="#embed" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h4>
<dl class="http get">
<dt class="sig sig-object http" id="get--api-v3-embed-">
<span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">GET</span> </span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/api/v3/embed/</span></span><a class="headerlink" href="#get--api-v3-embed-" title="Permalink to this definition">ÔÉÅ</a></dt>
<dd><p>Retrieve HTML-formatted content from documentation page or section.
Read <a class="reference internal" href="index.html#document-guides/embedding-content"><span class="doc">How to embed content from your documentation</span></a> to know more about how to use this endpoint.</p>
<p><strong>Example request</strong>:</p>
<div class="highlight-default notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="prompt1">curl<span class="w"> </span>https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/embed/?url<span class="o">=</span>https://docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/features.html%23read-the-docs-features</span>
</pre></div></div><p><strong>Example response</strong>:</p>
<div class="highlight-js notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;url&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/features.html#read-the-docs-features&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;fragment&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;read-the-docs-features&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;content&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;&lt;div class=\&quot;section\&quot; id=\&quot;read-the-docs-features\&quot;&gt;\n&lt;h1&gt;Read the Docs ...&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;external&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">false</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Response JSON Object<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>url</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì URL of the document.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>fragment</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì fragmet part of the URL used to query the page.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>content</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì HTML content of the section.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>external</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì whether or not the page is hosted on Read the Docs or externally.</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
<dt class="field-even">Query Parameters<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-even"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>url</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì full URL of the document (with optional fragment) to fetch content from.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>doctool</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì <em>optional</em> documentation tool key name used to generate the target documentation (currently, only <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">sphinx</span></code> is accepted)</p></li>
<li><p><strong>doctoolversion</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì <em>optional</em> documentation tool version used to generate the target documentation (e.g. <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">4.2.0</span></code>).</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
<div class="admonition note">
<p class="admonition-title">Note</p>
<p>Passing <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">?doctool=</span></code> and <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">?doctoolversion=</span></code> may improve the response,
since the endpoint will know more about the exact structure of the HTML and can make better decisions.</p>
</div>
</dd></dl>

</section>
