<span id="document-api/v2"></span><section id="api-v2">
<h3>API v2<a class="headerlink" href="#api-v2" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h3>
<p>The Read the Docs API uses <abbr title="Representational State Transfer">REST</abbr>.
JSON is returned by all API responses including errors
and HTTP response status codes are to designate success and failure.</p>
<div class="admonition warning">
<p class="admonition-title">Warning</p>
<p>API v2 is planned to be deprecated soon, though we have not yet set a time
frame for deprecation yet. We will alert users with our plans when we do.</p>
<p>For now, API v2 is still used by some legacy application operations still,
but we highly recommend Read the Docs users use <a class="reference internal" href="index.html#document-api/v3"><span class="doc">API v3</span></a>
instead.</p>
<p>Some improvements in <a class="reference internal" href="index.html#document-api/v3"><span class="doc">API v3</span></a> are:</p>
<ul class="simple">
<li><p>Token based authentication</p></li>
<li><p>Easier to use URLs which no longer use numerical ids</p></li>
<li><p>More common user actions are exposed through the API</p></li>
<li><p>Improved error reporting</p></li>
</ul>
<p>See its full documentation at <a class="reference internal" href="index.html#document-api/v3"><span class="doc">API v3</span></a>.</p>
</div>
<section id="authentication-and-authorization">
<h4>Authentication and authorization<a class="headerlink" href="#authentication-and-authorization" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h4>
<p>Requests to the Read the Docs public API are for public information only
and do not require any authentication.</p>
</section>
<section id="resources">
<h4>Resources<a class="headerlink" href="#resources" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h4>
<section id="projects">
<h5>Projects<a class="headerlink" href="#projects" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h5>
<p>Projects are the main building block of Read the Docs.
Projects are built when there are changes to the code
and the resulting documentation is hosted and served by Read the Docs.</p>
<p>As an example, this documentation is part of the <a class="reference external" href="https://readthedocs.org/projects/docs/">Docs project</a>
which has documentation at <a class="reference external" href="https://docs.readthedocs.io">https://docs.readthedocs.io</a>.</p>
<p>You can always view your Read the Docs projects in your <a class="reference external" href="https://readthedocs.org/dashboard/">project dashboard</a>.</p>
<section id="project-list">
<h6>Project list<a class="headerlink" href="#project-list" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h6>
<dl class="http get">
<dt class="sig sig-object http" id="get--api-v2-project-">
<span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">GET</span> </span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/api/v2/project/</span></span><a class="headerlink" href="#get--api-v2-project-" title="Permalink to this definition">ÔÉÅ</a></dt>
<dd><p>Retrieve a list of all Read the Docs projects.</p>
<p><strong>Example request</strong>:</p>
<div class="highlight-default notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><style type="text/css">
span.prompt1:before {
  content: "$ ";
}
</style><span class="prompt1">curl<span class="w"> </span>https://readthedocs.org/api/v2/project/?slug<span class="o">=</span>pip</span>
</pre></div></div><p><strong>Example response</strong>:</p>
<div class="highlight-js notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;count&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mf">1</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;next&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;previous&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;results&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="nx">PROJECTS</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Response JSON Object<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>next</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì URI for next set of Projects.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>previous</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì URI for previous set of Projects.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>count</strong> (<em>integer</em>) ‚Äì Total number of Projects.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>results</strong> (<em>array</em>) ‚Äì Array of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">Project</span></code> objects.</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
<dt class="field-even">Query Parameters<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-even"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>slug</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì Narrow the results by matching the exact project slug</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</dd></dl>

</section>
<section id="project-details">
<h6>Project details<a class="headerlink" href="#project-details" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h6>
<dl class="http get">
<dt class="sig sig-object http" id="get--api-v2-project-(int-id)-">
<span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">GET</span> </span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/api/v2/project/</span></span><span class="sig-paren">(</span><em class="property"><span class="pre">int:</span> </em><em class="sig-param"><span class="pre">id</span></em><span class="sig-paren">)</span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/</span></span><a class="headerlink" href="#get--api-v2-project-(int-id)-" title="Permalink to this definition">ÔÉÅ</a></dt>
<dd><p>Retrieve details of a single project.</p>
<div class="highlight-js notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;id&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mf">6</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;name&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Pip&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;slug&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;pip&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;programming_language&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;py&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;default_version&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;stable&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;default_branch&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;master&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;repo_type&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;git&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;repo&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://github.com/pypa/pip&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;description&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Pip Installs Packages.&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;language&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;en&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;documentation_type&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;sphinx_htmldir&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;canonical_url&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;http://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;users&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="nx">USERS</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Response JSON Object<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>id</strong> (<em>integer</em>) ‚Äì The ID of the project</p></li>
<li><p><strong>name</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The name of the project.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>slug</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The project slug (used in the URL).</p></li>
<li><p><strong>programming_language</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The programming language of the project (eg. ‚Äúpy‚Äù, ‚Äújs‚Äù)</p></li>
<li><p><strong>default_version</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The default version of the project (eg. ‚Äúlatest‚Äù, ‚Äústable‚Äù, ‚Äúv3‚Äù)</p></li>
<li><p><strong>default_branch</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The default version control branch</p></li>
<li><p><strong>repo_type</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì Version control repository of the project</p></li>
<li><p><strong>repo</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The repository URL for the project</p></li>
<li><p><strong>description</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì An RST description of the project</p></li>
<li><p><strong>language</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The language code of this project</p></li>
<li><p><strong>documentation_type</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì An RST description of the project</p></li>
<li><p><strong>canonical_url</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The canonical URL of the default docs</p></li>
<li><p><strong>users</strong> (<em>array</em>) ‚Äì Array of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">User</span></code> IDs who are maintainers of the project.</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
<dt class="field-even">Status Codes<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-even"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><span><a class="reference external" href="https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec10.html#sec10.2.1">200 OK</a></span> ‚Äì no error</p></li>
<li><p><span><a class="reference external" href="https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec10.html#sec10.4.5">404 Not Found</a></span> ‚Äì There is no <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">Project</span></code> with this ID</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</dd></dl>

</section>
<section id="project-versions">
<h6>Project versions<a class="headerlink" href="#project-versions" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h6>
<dl class="http get">
<dt class="sig sig-object http" id="get--api-v2-project-(int-id)-active_versions-">
<span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">GET</span> </span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/api/v2/project/</span></span><span class="sig-paren">(</span><em class="property"><span class="pre">int:</span> </em><em class="sig-param"><span class="pre">id</span></em><span class="sig-paren">)</span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/active_versions/</span></span><a class="headerlink" href="#get--api-v2-project-(int-id)-active_versions-" title="Permalink to this definition">ÔÉÅ</a></dt>
<dd><p>Retrieve a list of active versions (eg. ‚Äúlatest‚Äù, ‚Äústable‚Äù, ‚Äúv1.x‚Äù) for a single project.</p>
<div class="highlight-js notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;versions&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="nx">VERSION</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nx">VERSION</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">...]</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Response JSON Object<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>versions</strong> (<em>array</em>) ‚Äì Version objects for the given <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">Project</span></code></p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
<p>See the <a class="hxr-hoverxref hxr-tooltip reference internal" href="#api-version-detail"><span class="std std-ref">Version detail</span></a> call for the format of the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">Version</span></code> object.</p>
</dd></dl>

</section>
</section>
<section id="versions">
<h5>Versions<a class="headerlink" href="#versions" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h5>
<p>Versions are different versions of the same project documentation</p>
<p>The versions for a given project can be viewed in a project‚Äôs version screen.
For example, here is the <a class="reference external" href="https://readthedocs.org/projects/pip/versions/">Pip project‚Äôs version screen</a>.</p>
<section id="version-list">
<h6>Version list<a class="headerlink" href="#version-list" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h6>
<dl class="http get">
<dt class="sig sig-object http" id="get--api-v2-version-">
<span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">GET</span> </span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/api/v2/version/</span></span><a class="headerlink" href="#get--api-v2-version-" title="Permalink to this definition">ÔÉÅ</a></dt>
<dd><p>Retrieve a list of all Versions for all projects</p>
<div class="highlight-js notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;count&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mf">1000</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;previous&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;results&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="nx">VERSIONS</span><span class="p">],</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;next&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://readthedocs.org/api/v2/version/?limit=10&amp;offset=10&quot;</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Response JSON Object<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>next</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì URI for next set of Versions.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>previous</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì URI for previous set of Versions.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>count</strong> (<em>integer</em>) ‚Äì Total number of Versions.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>results</strong> (<em>array</em>) ‚Äì Array of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">Version</span></code> objects.</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
<dt class="field-even">Query Parameters<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-even"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>project__slug</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì Narrow to the versions for a specific <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">Project</span></code></p></li>
<li><p><strong>active</strong> (<em>boolean</em>) ‚Äì Pass <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">true</span></code> or <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">false</span></code> to show only active or inactive versions.
By default, the API returns all versions.</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</dd></dl>

</section>
<section id="version-detail">
<span id="api-version-detail"></span><h6>Version detail<a class="headerlink" href="#version-detail" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h6>
<dl class="http get">
<dt class="sig sig-object http" id="get--api-v2-version-(int-id)-">
<span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">GET</span> </span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/api/v2/version/</span></span><span class="sig-paren">(</span><em class="property"><span class="pre">int:</span> </em><em class="sig-param"><span class="pre">id</span></em><span class="sig-paren">)</span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/</span></span><a class="headerlink" href="#get--api-v2-version-(int-id)-" title="Permalink to this definition">ÔÉÅ</a></dt>
<dd><p>Retrieve details of a single version.</p>
<div class="highlight-js notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;id&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mf">1437428</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;slug&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;stable&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;verbose_name&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;stable&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;built&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;active&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;type&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;tag&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;identifier&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;3a6b3995c141c0888af6591a59240ba5db7d9914&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;privacy_level&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;public&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;downloads&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="s2">&quot;pdf&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;//readthedocs.org/projects/pip/downloads/pdf/stable/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="s2">&quot;htmlzip&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;//readthedocs.org/projects/pip/downloads/htmlzip/stable/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="s2">&quot;epub&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;//readthedocs.org/projects/pip/downloads/epub/stable/&quot;</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;project&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="nx">PROJECT</span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Response JSON Object<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>id</strong> (<em>integer</em>) ‚Äì The ID of the version</p></li>
<li><p><strong>verbose_name</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The name of the version.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>slug</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The version slug.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>built</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì Whether this version has been built</p></li>
<li><p><strong>active</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì Whether this version is still active</p></li>
<li><p><strong>type</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The type of this version (typically ‚Äútag‚Äù or ‚Äúbranch‚Äù)</p></li>
<li><p><strong>identifier</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì A version control identifier for this version (eg. the commit hash of the tag)</p></li>
<li><p><strong>downloads</strong> (<em>array</em>) ‚Äì URLs to downloads of this version‚Äôs documentation</p></li>
<li><p><strong>project</strong> (<em>object</em>) ‚Äì Details of the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">Project</span></code> for this version.</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
<dt class="field-even">Status Codes<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-even"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><span><a class="reference external" href="https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec10.html#sec10.2.1">200 OK</a></span> ‚Äì no error</p></li>
<li><p><span><a class="reference external" href="https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec10.html#sec10.4.5">404 Not Found</a></span> ‚Äì There is no <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">Version</span></code> with this ID</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</dd></dl>

</section>
</section>
<section id="builds">
<h5>Builds<a class="headerlink" href="#builds" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h5>
<p>Builds are created by Read the Docs whenever a <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">Project</span></code> has its documentation built.
Frequently this happens automatically via a web hook but can be triggered manually.</p>
<p>Builds can be viewed in the build screen for a project.
For example, here is <a class="reference external" href="https://readthedocs.org/projects/pip/builds/">Pip‚Äôs build screen</a>.</p>
<section id="build-list">
<h6>Build list<a class="headerlink" href="#build-list" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h6>
<dl class="http get">
<dt class="sig sig-object http" id="get--api-v2-build-">
<span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">GET</span> </span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/api/v2/build/</span></span><a class="headerlink" href="#get--api-v2-build-" title="Permalink to this definition">ÔÉÅ</a></dt>
<dd><p>Retrieve details of builds ordered by most recent first</p>
<p><strong>Example request</strong>:</p>
<div class="highlight-default notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="prompt1">curl<span class="w"> </span>https://readthedocs.org/api/v2/build/?project__slug<span class="o">=</span>pip</span>
</pre></div></div><p><strong>Example response</strong>:</p>
<div class="highlight-js notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;count&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mf">100</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;next&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;previous&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;results&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="nx">BUILDS</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Response JSON Object<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>next</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì URI for next set of Builds.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>previous</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì URI for previous set of Builds.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>count</strong> (<em>integer</em>) ‚Äì Total number of Builds.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>results</strong> (<em>array</em>) ‚Äì Array of <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">Build</span></code> objects.</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
<dt class="field-even">Query Parameters<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-even"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>project__slug</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì Narrow to builds for a specific <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">Project</span></code></p></li>
<li><p><strong>commit</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì Narrow to builds for a specific <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">commit</span></code></p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
</dd></dl>

</section>
<section id="build-detail">
<h6>Build detail<a class="headerlink" href="#build-detail" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h6>
<dl class="http get">
<dt class="sig sig-object http" id="get--api-v2-build-(int-id)-">
<span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">GET</span> </span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/api/v2/build/</span></span><span class="sig-paren">(</span><em class="property"><span class="pre">int:</span> </em><em class="sig-param"><span class="pre">id</span></em><span class="sig-paren">)</span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/</span></span><a class="headerlink" href="#get--api-v2-build-(int-id)-" title="Permalink to this definition">ÔÉÅ</a></dt>
<dd><p>Retrieve details of a single build.</p>
<div class="highlight-js notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;id&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mf">7367364</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;date&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;2018-06-19T15:15:59.135894&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;length&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mf">59</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;type&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;html&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;state&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;finished&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;success&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;error&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;commit&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;6f808d743fd6f6907ad3e2e969c88a549e76db30&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;docs_url&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;http://pip.pypa.io/en/latest/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;project&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mf">13</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;project_slug&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;pip&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;version&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mf">3681</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;version_slug&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;latest&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;commands&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="s2">&quot;description&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="s2">&quot;start_time&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;2018-06-19T20:16:00.951959&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="s2">&quot;exit_code&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mf">0</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="s2">&quot;build&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mf">7367364</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="s2">&quot;command&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;git remote set-url origin git://github.com/pypa/pip.git&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="s2">&quot;run_time&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mf">0</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="s2">&quot;output&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="s2">&quot;id&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mf">42852216</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="s2">&quot;end_time&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;2018-06-19T20:16:00.969170&quot;</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">...</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="p">],</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="p">...</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Response JSON Object<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>id</strong> (<em>integer</em>) ‚Äì The ID of the build</p></li>
<li><p><strong>date</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The ISO-8601 datetime of the build.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>length</strong> (<em>integer</em>) ‚Äì The length of the build in seconds.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>type</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The type of the build (one of ‚Äúhtml‚Äù, ‚Äúpdf‚Äù, ‚Äúepub‚Äù)</p></li>
<li><p><strong>state</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The state of the build (one of ‚Äútriggered‚Äù, ‚Äúbuilding‚Äù, ‚Äúinstalling‚Äù, ‚Äúcloning‚Äù, or ‚Äúfinished‚Äù)</p></li>
<li><p><strong>success</strong> (<em>boolean</em>) ‚Äì Whether the build was successful</p></li>
<li><p><strong>error</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì An error message if the build was unsuccessful</p></li>
<li><p><strong>commit</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì A version control identifier for this build (eg. the commit hash)</p></li>
<li><p><strong>docs_url</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The canonical URL of the build docs</p></li>
<li><p><strong>project</strong> (<em>integer</em>) ‚Äì The ID of the project being built</p></li>
<li><p><strong>project_slug</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The slug for the project being built</p></li>
<li><p><strong>version</strong> (<em>integer</em>) ‚Äì The ID of the version of the project being built</p></li>
<li><p><strong>version_slug</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The slug for the version of the project being built</p></li>
<li><p><strong>commands</strong> (<em>array</em>) ‚Äì Array of commands for the build with details including output.</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
<dt class="field-even">Status Codes<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-even"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><span><a class="reference external" href="https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec10.html#sec10.2.1">200 OK</a></span> ‚Äì no error</p></li>
<li><p><span><a class="reference external" href="https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec10.html#sec10.4.5">404 Not Found</a></span> ‚Äì There is no <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">Build</span></code> with this ID</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
<p>Some fields primarily used for UI elements in Read the Docs are omitted.</p>
</dd></dl>

</section>
</section>
<section id="embed">
<h5>Embed<a class="headerlink" href="#embed" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h5>
<dl class="http get">
<dt class="sig sig-object http" id="get--api-v2-embed-">
<span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">GET</span> </span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/api/v2/embed/</span></span><a class="headerlink" href="#get--api-v2-embed-" title="Permalink to this definition">ÔÉÅ</a></dt>
<dd><p>Retrieve HTML-formatted content from documentation page or section.</p>
<p><strong>Example request</strong>:</p>
<div class="highlight-default notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="prompt1">curl<span class="w"> </span>https://readthedocs.org/api/v2/embed/?project<span class="o">=</span>docs<span class="p">&amp;</span><span class="nv">version</span><span class="o">=</span>latest<span class="p">&amp;</span><span class="nv">doc</span><span class="o">=</span>features<span class="p">&amp;</span><span class="nv">path</span><span class="o">=</span>features.html</span>
</pre></div></div><p>or</p>
<div class="highlight-default notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="prompt1">curl<span class="w"> </span>https://readthedocs.org/api/v2/embed/?url<span class="o">=</span>https://docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/features.html</span>
</pre></div></div><p><strong>Example response</strong>:</p>
<div class="highlight-js notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;content&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="s2">&quot;&lt;div class=\&quot;section\&quot; id=\&quot;read-the-docs-features\&quot;&gt;\n&lt;h1&gt;Read the Docs...&quot;</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="p">],</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;headers&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="s2">&quot;Read the Docs features&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;#&quot;</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="s2">&quot;Automatic Documentation Deployment&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;#automatic-documentation-deployment&quot;</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="s2">&quot;Custom Domains &amp; White Labeling&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;#custom-domains-white-labeling&quot;</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="s2">&quot;Versioned Documentation&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;#versioned-documentation&quot;</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="s2">&quot;Downloadable Documentation&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;#downloadable-documentation&quot;</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="s2">&quot;Full-Text Search&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;#full-text-search&quot;</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="s2">&quot;Open Source and Customer Focused&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;#open-source-and-customer-focused&quot;</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="p">],</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;url&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/features&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="s2">&quot;meta&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="s2">&quot;project&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;docs&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="s2">&quot;version&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;latest&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="s2">&quot;doc&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;features&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="s2">&quot;section&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;read the docs features&quot;</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Response JSON Object<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>content</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì HTML content of the section.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>headers</strong> (<em>object</em>) ‚Äì section‚Äôs headers in the document.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>url</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì URL of the document.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>meta</strong> (<em>object</em>) ‚Äì meta data of the requested section.</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
<dt class="field-even">Query Parameters<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-even"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>project</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì Read the Docs project‚Äôs slug.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>doc</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì document to fetch content from.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>version</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì <em>optional</em> Read the Docs version‚Äôs slug (default: <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">latest</span></code>).</p></li>
<li><p><strong>section</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì <em>optional</em> section within the document to fetch.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>path</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì <em>optional</em> full path to the document including extension.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>url</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì full URL of the document (and section) to fetch content from.</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
<div class="admonition note">
<p class="admonition-title">Note</p>
<p>You can call this endpoint by sending at least <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">project</span></code> and <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">doc</span></code> <em>or</em> <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">url</span></code> attribute.</p>
</div>
</dd></dl>

</section>
<section id="undocumented-resources-and-endpoints">
<h5>Undocumented resources and endpoints<a class="headerlink" href="#undocumented-resources-and-endpoints" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h5>
<p>There are some undocumented endpoints in the API.
These should not be used and could change at any time.
These include:</p>
<ul class="simple">
<li><p>Endpoints for returning footer and version data to be injected into docs.
(<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">/api/v2/footer_html</span></code>)</p></li>
<li><p>Endpoints used for advertising (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">/api/v2/sustainability/</span></code>)</p></li>
<li><p>Any other endpoints not detailed above.</p></li>
</ul>
</section>
</section>
</section>
<span id="document-server-side-search/api"></span><section id="server-side-search-api">
<h3>Server side search API<a class="headerlink" href="#server-side-search-api" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h3>
<p>You can integrate our <a class="reference internal" href="index.html#document-server-side-search/index"><span class="doc">server side search</span></a> in your documentation by using our API.</p>
<p>If you are using <a class="reference internal" href="index.html#document-commercial/index"><span class="doc">About Read the Docs for Business</span></a> you will need to replace
<a class="reference external" href="https://readthedocs.org/">https://readthedocs.org/</a> with <a class="reference external" href="https://readthedocs.com/">https://readthedocs.com/</a> in all the URLs used in the following examples.
Check <a class="hxr-hoverxref hxr-tooltip reference internal" href="#authentication-and-authorization"><span class="std std-ref">Authentication and authorization</span></a> if you are using private versions.</p>
<section id="api-v3">
<h4>API v3<a class="headerlink" href="#api-v3" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h4>
<dl class="http get">
<dt class="sig sig-object http" id="get--api-v3-search-">
<span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">GET</span> </span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/api/v3/search/</span></span><a class="headerlink" href="#get--api-v3-search-" title="Permalink to this definition">ÔÉÅ</a></dt>
<dd><p>Return a list of search results for a project or subset of projects.
Results are divided into sections with highlights of the matching term.</p>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Query Parameters<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>q</strong> ‚Äì Search query (see <a class="reference internal" href="index.html#document-server-side-search/syntax"><span class="doc">Search query syntax</span></a>)</p></li>
<li><p><strong>page</strong> ‚Äì Jump to a specific page</p></li>
<li><p><strong>page_size</strong> ‚Äì Limits the results per page, default is 50</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Response JSON Object<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>type</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The type of the result, currently page is the only type.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>project</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The project object</p></li>
<li><p><strong>version</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The version object</p></li>
<li><p><strong>title</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The title of the page</p></li>
<li><p><strong>domain</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì Canonical domain of the resulting page</p></li>
<li><p><strong>path</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì Path to the resulting page</p></li>
<li><p><strong>highlights</strong> (<em>object</em>) ‚Äì An object containing a list of substrings with matching terms.
Note that the text is HTML escaped with the matching terms inside a &lt;span&gt; tag.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>blocks</strong> (<em>object</em>) ‚Äì <p>A list of block objects containing search results from the page.
Currently, there are two types of blocks:</p>
<ul>
<li><p>section: A page section with a linkable anchor (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">id</span></code> attribute).</p></li>
<li><p>domain: A Sphinx <a class="hxr-hoverxref hxr-tooltip reference external" href="https://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/master/usage/restructuredtext/domains.html" title="(in Sphinx v7.1.0)"><span class="xref std std-doc">domain</span></a>
with a linkable anchor (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">id</span></code> attribute).</p></li>
</ul>
</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
<p><strong>Example request</strong>:</p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" class="closeable" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-0-QmFzaA==" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-0-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tab" tabindex="0">Bash</button><button aria-controls="panel-0-UHl0aG9u" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-0-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tab" tabindex="-1">Python</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-0-QmFzaA==" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-0-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-bash notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span>$<span class="w"> </span>curl<span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/search/?q=project:docs%20server%20side%20search&quot;</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-0-UHl0aG9u" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-0-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-python notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>
<span class="n">URL</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/search/&#39;</span>
<span class="n">params</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
   <span class="s1">&#39;q&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">&#39;project:docs server side search&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">URL</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">params</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">params</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">json</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div></div>
<p><strong>Example response</strong>:</p>
<div class="highlight-json notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;count&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">41</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;next&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://readthedocs.org/api/v3/search/?page=2&amp;q=project:docs%20server+side+search&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;previous&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;projects&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span>
<span class="w">       </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">         </span><span class="nt">&quot;slug&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;docs&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">         </span><span class="nt">&quot;versions&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span>
<span class="w">           </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="nt">&quot;slug&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;latest&quot;</span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="w">         </span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="w">       </span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="p">],</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;query&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;server side search&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;results&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;type&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;page&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;project&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">               </span><span class="nt">&quot;slug&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;docs&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">               </span><span class="nt">&quot;alias&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;version&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">               </span><span class="nt">&quot;slug&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;latest&quot;</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;title&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Server Side Search&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;domain&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://docs.readthedocs.io&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;path&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/en/latest/server-side-search.html&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;highlights&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">                </span><span class="nt">&quot;title&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span>
<span class="w">                    </span><span class="s2">&quot;&lt;span&gt;Server&lt;/span&gt; &lt;span&gt;Side&lt;/span&gt; &lt;span&gt;Search&lt;/span&gt;&quot;</span>
<span class="w">                </span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;blocks&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span>
<span class="w">               </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">                  </span><span class="nt">&quot;type&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;section&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">                  </span><span class="nt">&quot;id&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;server-side-search&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">                  </span><span class="nt">&quot;title&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Server Side Search&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">                  </span><span class="nt">&quot;content&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Read the Docs provides full-text search across all of the pages of all projects, this is powered by Elasticsearch.&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">                  </span><span class="nt">&quot;highlights&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">                     </span><span class="nt">&quot;title&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span>
<span class="w">                        </span><span class="s2">&quot;&lt;span&gt;Server&lt;/span&gt; &lt;span&gt;Side&lt;/span&gt; &lt;span&gt;Search&lt;/span&gt;&quot;</span>
<span class="w">                     </span><span class="p">],</span>
<span class="w">                     </span><span class="nt">&quot;content&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span>
<span class="w">                        </span><span class="s2">&quot;You can &lt;span&gt;search&lt;/span&gt; all projects at https:&amp;#x2F;&amp;#x2F;readthedocs.org&amp;#x2F;&lt;span&gt;search&lt;/span&gt;&amp;#x2F&quot;</span>
<span class="w">                     </span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="w">                  </span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="w">               </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="w">               </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">                  </span><span class="nt">&quot;type&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;domain&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">                  </span><span class="nt">&quot;role&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;http:get&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">                  </span><span class="nt">&quot;name&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/_/api/v2/search/&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">                  </span><span class="nt">&quot;id&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;get--_-api-v2-search-&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">                  </span><span class="nt">&quot;content&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Retrieve search results for docs&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">                  </span><span class="nt">&quot;highlights&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">                     </span><span class="nt">&quot;name&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">&quot;&quot;</span><span class="p">],</span>
<span class="w">                     </span><span class="nt">&quot;content&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">&quot;Retrieve &lt;span&gt;search&lt;/span&gt; results for docs&quot;</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="w">                  </span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="w">               </span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">},</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</dd></dl>

<section id="migrating-from-api-v2">
<h5>Migrating from API v2<a class="headerlink" href="#migrating-from-api-v2" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h5>
<p>Instead of using query arguments to specify the project
and version to search, you need to do it from the query itself,
this is if you had the following parameters:</p>
<ul class="simple">
<li><p>project: docs</p></li>
<li><p>version: latest</p></li>
<li><p>q: test</p></li>
</ul>
<p>Now you need to use:</p>
<ul class="simple">
<li><p>q: project:docs/latest test</p></li>
</ul>
<p>The response of the API is very similar to V2,
with the following changes:</p>
<ul class="simple">
<li><p><code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">project</span></code> is an object, not a string.</p></li>
<li><p><code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">version</span></code> is an object, not a string.</p></li>
<li><p><code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">project_alias</span></code> isn‚Äôt present,
it is contained in the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">project</span></code> object.</p></li>
</ul>
<p>When searching on a parent project,
results from their subprojects won‚Äôt be included automatically,
to include results from subprojects use the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">subprojects</span></code> paramater.</p>
</section>
</section>
<section id="authentication-and-authorization">
<h4>Authentication and authorization<a class="headerlink" href="#authentication-and-authorization" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h4>
<p>If you are using <a class="hxr-hoverxref hxr-tooltip reference internal" href="index.html#privacy-levels"><span class="std std-ref">private versions</span></a>,
users will only be allowed to search projects they have permissions over.
Authentication and authorization is done using the current session,
or any of the valid <a class="reference internal" href="index.html#document-commercial/sharing"><span class="doc">sharing methods</span></a>.</p>
<p>To be able to use the user‚Äôs current session you need to use the API from the domain where your docs are being served
(<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">&lt;you-docs-domain&gt;/_/api/v3/search/</span></code>).
This is <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">https://docs.readthedocs-hosted.com/_/api/v3/search/</span></code>
for the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">https://docs.readthedocs-hosted.com/</span></code> project, for example.</p>
</section>
<section id="api-v2-deprecated">
<h4>API v2 (deprecated)<a class="headerlink" href="#api-v2-deprecated" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h4>
<div class="admonition note">
<p class="admonition-title">Note</p>
<p>Please use our <a class="hxr-hoverxref hxr-tooltip reference internal" href="#api-v3"><span class="std std-ref">API v3</span></a> instead,
see <a class="hxr-hoverxref hxr-tooltip reference internal" href="#migrating-from-api-v2"><span class="std std-ref">Migrating from API v2</span></a>.</p>
</div>
<dl class="http get">
<dt class="sig sig-object http" id="get--api-v2-search-">
<span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">GET</span> </span><span class="sig-name descname"><span class="pre">/api/v2/search/</span></span><a class="headerlink" href="#get--api-v2-search-" title="Permalink to this definition">ÔÉÅ</a></dt>
<dd><p>Return a list of search results for a project,
including results from its <a class="reference internal" href="index.html#document-subprojects"><span class="doc">Subprojects: host multiple projects on a single domain</span></a>.
Results are divided into sections with highlights of the matching term.</p>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Query Parameters<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>q</strong> ‚Äì Search query</p></li>
<li><p><strong>project</strong> ‚Äì Project slug</p></li>
<li><p><strong>version</strong> ‚Äì Version slug</p></li>
<li><p><strong>page</strong> ‚Äì Jump to a specific page</p></li>
<li><p><strong>page_size</strong> ‚Äì Limits the results per page, default is 50</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Response JSON Object<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><ul class="simple">
<li><p><strong>type</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The type of the result, currently page is the only type.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>project</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The project slug</p></li>
<li><p><strong>project_alias</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì Alias of the project if it‚Äôs a subproject.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>version</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The version slug</p></li>
<li><p><strong>title</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì The title of the page</p></li>
<li><p><strong>domain</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì Canonical domain of the resulting page</p></li>
<li><p><strong>path</strong> (<em>string</em>) ‚Äì Path to the resulting page</p></li>
<li><p><strong>highlights</strong> (<em>object</em>) ‚Äì An object containing a list of substrings with matching terms.
Note that the text is HTML escaped with the matching terms inside a &lt;span&gt; tag.</p></li>
<li><p><strong>blocks</strong> (<em>object</em>) ‚Äì <p>A list of block objects containing search results from the page.
Currently, there are two types of blocks:</p>
<ul>
<li><p>section: A page section with a linkable anchor (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">id</span></code> attribute).</p></li>
<li><p>domain: A Sphinx <a class="hxr-hoverxref hxr-tooltip reference external" href="https://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/master/usage/restructuredtext/domains.html" title="(in Sphinx v7.1.0)"><span class="xref std std-doc">domain</span></a>
with a linkable anchor (<code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">id</span></code> attribute).</p></li>
</ul>
</p></li>
</ul>
</dd>
</dl>
<p><strong>Example request</strong>:</p>
<div class="sphinx-tabs docutils container">
<div aria-label="Tabbed content" class="closeable" role="tablist"><button aria-controls="panel-1-QmFzaA==" aria-selected="true" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-1-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tab" tabindex="0">Bash</button><button aria-controls="panel-1-UHl0aG9u" aria-selected="false" class="sphinx-tabs-tab code-tab group-tab" id="tab-1-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tab" tabindex="-1">Python</button></div><div aria-labelledby="tab-1-QmFzaA==" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" id="panel-1-QmFzaA==" name="QmFzaA==" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-bash notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span>$<span class="w"> </span>curl<span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://readthedocs.org/api/v2/search/?project=docs&amp;version=latest&amp;q=server%20side%20search&quot;</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div><div aria-labelledby="tab-1-UHl0aG9u" class="sphinx-tabs-panel code-tab group-tab" hidden="true" id="panel-1-UHl0aG9u" name="UHl0aG9u" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0"><div class="highlight-python notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>
<span class="n">URL</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;https://readthedocs.org/api/v2/search/&#39;</span>
<span class="n">params</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
   <span class="s1">&#39;q&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">&#39;server side search&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
   <span class="s1">&#39;project&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">&#39;docs&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
   <span class="s1">&#39;version&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">&#39;latest&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">URL</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">params</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">params</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">json</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div></div>
<p><strong>Example response</strong>:</p>
<div class="highlight-json notranslate"><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;count&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="mi">41</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;next&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://readthedocs.org/api/v2/search/?page=2&amp;project=read-the-docs&amp;q=server+side+search&amp;version=latest&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;previous&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">    </span><span class="nt">&quot;results&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">[</span>
<span class="w">        </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;type&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;page&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;project&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;docs&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>

<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;version&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;latest&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;title&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;Server Side Search&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;domain&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;https://docs.readthedocs.io&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">            </span><span class="nt">&quot;path&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;/en/latest/server-side-search.html&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>

<span class="w">               </span><span class="p">{</span>
<span class="w">                  </span><span class="nt">&quot;type&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;section&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="w">                  </span><span class="nt">&quot;id&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&quot;server-side-search&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>

<span id="document-api/cross-site-requests"></span><section id="cross-site-requests">
<h3>Cross-site requests<a class="headerlink" href="#cross-site-requests" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h3>
<p>Cross site requests are allowed for the following endpoints:</p>
<ul class="simple">
<li><p><a class="hxr-hoverxref hxr-tooltip reference internal" href="index.html#undocumented-resources-and-endpoints"><span class="std std-ref">/api/v2/footer_html/</span></a></p></li>
<li><p><a class="hxr-hoverxref hxr-tooltip reference internal" href="index.html#api-v2-deprecated"><span class="std std-ref">/api/v2/search/</span></a></p></li>
<li><p><a class="hxr-hoverxref hxr-tooltip reference internal" href="index.html#embed"><span class="std std-ref">/api/v2/embed/</span></a></p></li>
<li><p><a class="hxr-hoverxref hxr-tooltip reference internal" href="index.html#undocumented-resources-and-endpoints"><span class="std std-ref">/api/v2/sustainability/</span></a></p></li>
<li><p><a class="hxr-hoverxref hxr-tooltip reference internal" href="index.html#embed"><span class="std std-ref">/api/v3/embed/</span></a></p></li>
</ul>
<p>Except for the sustainability API, all of the above endpoints
don‚Äôt allow you to pass credentials in cross-site requests.
In other words, these API endpoints allow you to access <strong>public information only</strong>.</p>
<p>On a technical level, this is achieved by implementing the <a class="reference external" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross-origin_resource_sharing">CORS</a> standard,
which is supported by all major browsers.
We implement it such way that it strictly match the intention of the API endpoint.</p>
<section id="cookies">
<h4>Cookies<a class="headerlink" href="#cookies" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h4>
<p>On Read the Docs Community, our session cookies have the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">SameSite</span></code> attribute set to <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">None</span></code>,
this means they can be sent in cross site requests.
This is needed for our sustainability API only,
to not show ads if the current user is a <a class="hxr-hoverxref hxr-tooltip reference internal" href="index.html#going-ad-free"><span class="std std-ref">Gold User</span></a>.
All resources in Read the Docs Community are public, you don‚Äôt need to pass cookies to make use
of our allowed APIs from other sites.</p>
<p>On Read the Docs for Business, our session cookies have the <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">SameSite</span></code> attribute set to <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">Lax</span></code>.
This means that browsers will not include them in cross site requests.
If you need to have access to versions that the current user has permissions over,
you can make use of our proxied APIs, they can be accessed from docs domains with the <code class="xref py py-obj docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">/_/</span></code> prefix.
For example, you can make use of our search API from <code class="xref py py-obj docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">&lt;your-docs-domain&gt;/_/api/v2/search/</span></code>.</p>
</section>
</section>
</div>
</section>

<ul class="simple">

<section id="version-8-0-0">

<dt class="field-odd">Date<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><p>May 03, 2022</p>
</dd>
</dl>
<div class="admonition note">
<p class="admonition-title">Note</p>
<p>We are upgrading to Ubuntu 22.04 LTS and also to Python 3.10.</p>
</div>
<p>Projects using Mamba with the old feature flag, and now removed, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">CONDA_USES_MAMBA</span></code>,
have to update their <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">.readthedocs.yaml</span></code> file to use <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">build.tools.python:</span> <span class="pre">mambaforge-4.10</span></code>
to continue using Mamba to create their environment.
See more about <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">build.tools.python</span></code> at <a class="reference external" href="https://docs.readthedocs.io/en/stable/config-file/v2.html#build-tools-python">https://docs.readthedocs.io/en/stable/config-file/v2.html#build-tools-python</a></p>
<ul class="simple">

<section id="version-6-0-0">
<h3>Version 6.0.0<a class="headerlink" href="#version-6-0-0" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h3>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Date<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><p>October 13, 2021</p>
</dd>
</dl>
<p>This release includes the upgrade of some base dependencies:</p>
<ul class="simple">
<li><p>Python version from 3.6 to 3.8</p></li>
<li><p>Ubuntu version from 18.04 LTS to 20.04 LTS</p></li>
</ul>
<p>Starting from this release, all the Read the Docs code will be tested and QAed on these versions.</p>
<ul class="simple">
<li><p><a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/ericholscher">&#64;ericholscher</a>: Release 5.25.1 (<a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/pull/8576">#8576</a>)</p></li>
<li><p><a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/deepto98">&#64;deepto98</a>: Moved authenticated_classes definitions from API classes to AuthenticatedClassesMixin (<a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/pull/8562">#8562</a>)</p></li>
<li><p><a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/humitos">&#64;humitos</a>: Upgrade to Ubuntu 20.04 and Python 3.8 (<a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/pull/7421">#7421</a>)</p></li>
</ul>
</section>

<section id="version-5-1-0">
<h3>Version 5.1.0<a class="headerlink" href="#version-5-1-0" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h3>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Date<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><p>May 19, 2020</p>
</dd>
</dl>
<p>This release includes one major new feature which is Pageview Analytics.
This allows projects to see the pages in their docs that have been viewed in the past 30 days,
giving them an idea of what pages to focus on when updating them.</p>
<p>This release also has a few small search improvements, doc updates, and other bugfixes as well.</p>
<ul class="simple">
<li><p><a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/ericholscher">&#64;ericholscher</a>: Add a setting for storing pageviews (<a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/pull/7097">#7097</a>)</p></li>
<li><p><a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/stsewd">&#64;stsewd</a>: Footer: Check for mkdocs doctype too (<a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/pull/7094">#7094</a>)</p></li>
<li><p><a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/ericholscher">&#64;ericholscher</a>: Fix the unresolver not working properly with root paths (<a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/pull/7093">#7093</a>)</p></li>
<li><p><a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/stsewd">&#64;stsewd</a>: Privacy levels: migrate protected versions (<a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/pull/7092">#7092</a>)</p></li>
<li><p><a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/humitos">&#64;humitos</a>: Guide for Embed API (<a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/pull/7089">#7089</a>)</p></li>

<li><p><a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/stsewd">&#64;stsewd</a>: Search: record queries with 0 results (<a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/pull/7081">#7081</a>)</p></li>
<li><p><a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/stsewd">&#64;stsewd</a>: Search: track total results (<a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/pull/7080">#7080</a>)</p></li>
<li><p><a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/humitos">&#64;humitos</a>: Proxy embed URL (<a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/pull/7079">#7079</a>)</p></li>

<section id="version-5-0-0">
<h3>Version 5.0.0<a class="headerlink" href="#version-5-0-0" title="Permalink to this heading">ÔÉÅ</a></h3>
<dl class="field-list simple">
<dt class="field-odd">Date<span class="colon">:</span></dt>
<dd class="field-odd"><p>May 12, 2020</p>
</dd>
</dl>
<p>This release includes two large changes, one that is breaking and requires a major version upgrade:</p>
<ul class="simple">
<li><p>We have removed our deprecated doc serving code that used <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">core/views</span></code>, <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">core/symlinks</span></code>, and <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">builds/syncers</span></code> (<a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/pull/6535">#6535</a>). All doc serving should now be done via <code class="docutils literal notranslate"><span class="pre">proxito</span></code>. In production this has been the case for over a month, we have now removed the deprecated code from the codebase.</p></li>
<li><p>We did a large documentation refactor that should make things nicer to read and highlights more of our existing features. This is the first of a series of new documentation additions we have planned</p></li>
<li><p><a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/ericholscher">&#64;ericholscher</a>: Fix the caching of featured projects (<a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/pull/7054">#7054</a>)</p></li>
<li><p><a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/ericholscher">&#64;ericholscher</a>: Docs: Refactor and simplify our docs (<a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/pull/7052">#7052</a>)</p></li>
<li><p><a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/stsewd">&#64;stsewd</a>: Mention using ssh URLs when using private submodules (<a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/pull/7046">#7046</a>)</p></li>
<li><p><a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/ericholscher">&#64;ericholscher</a>: Show project slug in Version admin (<a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/pull/7042">#7042</a>)</p></li>
<li><p><a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/stsewd">&#64;stsewd</a>: List apiv3 first (<a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/pull/7041">#7041</a>)</p></li>
<li><p><a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/stsewd">&#64;stsewd</a>: Remove CELERY_ROUTER flag (<a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/pull/7040">#7040</a>)</p></li>
<li><p><a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/stsewd">&#64;stsewd</a>: Search: remove unused taxonomy field (<a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/pull/7033">#7033</a>)</p></li>
<li><p><a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/agjohnson">&#64;agjohnson</a>: Use a high time limit for celery build task (<a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/pull/7029">#7029</a>)</p></li>
<li><p><a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/ericholscher">&#64;ericholscher</a>: Clean up build admin to make list display match search (<a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/pull/7028">#7028</a>)</p></li>

<li><p><a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/stsewd">&#64;stsewd</a>: Implement repo_exists for all VCS backends (<a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/readthedocs/readthedocs.org/pull/7025">#7025</a>)</p></li>
